SELECT 
`active_from` 
,to_json(`billing_data`) `billing_data` 
,to_json(`changed_by`) `changed_by` 
,`city` 
,to_json(`contact_hour`) `contact_hour` 
,`country` 
,`email_address` 
,`end_date_time` 
,to_json(`extended_attributes`) `extended_attributes` 
,`fax_number` 
,`id` 
,`is_active` 
,`phone_ext_number` 
,`phone_number` 
,`postcode` 
,`preferred_contact` 
,`preferred_notification` 
,`push_notification_group_key` 
,`ref_id` 
,`ref_type` 
,`social_network_id` 
,`start_date_time` 
,`state_or_province`

,`street2` 
,`type_of_contact` 
,`type_of_contact_method` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:floor AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_floor` 
,CAST(extended_attributes:suite AS STRING) AS `extended_attributes_suite` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp`

,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest`

 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
`active_from` 
,`active_to` 
,`id` 
,`idempotency_key` 
,`is_snapshot` 
,to_json(`item`) `item` 
,`last_modified_ts` 
,`schema_version` 
,`is_deleted` 
,`state` 
,`is_current` 
,`version` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(item:accountRef AS STRING) AS `item_accountRef` 
,CAST(item:businessGroup.id AS STRING) AS `item_businessGroup_id` 
,CAST(item:customerId AS STRING) AS `item_customerId` 
,CAST(item:distributionChannelId AS STRING) AS `item_distributionChannelId` 
,CAST(item:expirationDate AS STRING) AS `item_expirationDate` 
,CAST(item:extendedAttributes AS STRING) AS `item_extendedAttributes` 
,CAST(item:name AS STRING) AS `item_name` 
,CAST(item:offeringId AS STRING) AS `item_offeringId` 
,CAST(item:offeringName AS STRING) AS `item_offeringName` 
,CAST(item:parentId AS STRING) AS `item_parentId` 
--,CAST(item:prices AS STRING) AS `item_prices` 
,CAST(item:productFamilyId AS STRING) AS `item_productFamilyId` 
,CAST(item:productFamilyName AS STRING) AS `item_productFamilyName` 
,CAST(item:productRelationship[0].productId AS STRING) AS `item_productRelationship_productId` 
,CAST(item:productRelationship[0].relationshipType AS STRING) AS `item_productRelationship_relationshipType` 
,CAST(item:productSpecificationRef AS STRING) AS `item_productSpecificationRef` 
,CAST(item:quantity AS STRING) AS `item_quantity` 
,CAST(item:quoteId AS STRING) AS `item_quoteId` 
,CAST(item:relatedPartyRef AS STRING) AS `item_relatedPartyRef` 
,CAST(item:rootId AS STRING) AS `item_rootId` 
,CAST(item:type AS STRING) AS `item_type` 
,CAST(item:version AS STRING) AS `item_version` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_IsDeleted` 
,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest` 
 
FROM dai.@{activity('Lookup_Source_Schema_Name').output.firstRow.SourceSchemaName}.`ibsitemshistory`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
    id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN exploded.characteristics.name = 'Technology' THEN exploded.characteristics.value[0] END) AS technology,
    MAX(CASE WHEN exploded.characteristics.name = 'International Phone Number' THEN exploded.characteristics.value[0] END) AS international_phone_number,
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID,
	NUUDL_IsDeleted,
	NUUDL_DeleteType,
	NUUDL_IsLatest
FROM (
  SELECT 
    id, 
    explode(from_json(CAST(item AS STRING), 'struct<characteristics:array<struct<name:string,value:array<string>>>>').characteristics) AS characteristics,
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID,
	NUUDL_IsDeleted,
	NUUDL_DeleteType,
	NUUDL_IsLatest
  FROM dai.netcracker12.ibsitemshistory
) AS exploded
WHERE exploded.characteristics.name IN ('Technology','International Phone Number')
GROUP BY 
    id,    
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID,
	NUUDL_IsDeleted,
	NUUDL_DeleteType,
	NUUDL_IsLatest

SELECT 
[comments.author] 
,[comments.text] 
,[comments.timestamp] 
,[id] 
,[sourceFilename] 
,[processedTimestamp] 
,[hour] 
,[quarterhour] 
,[DWSourceFilePath] AS [SRC_DWSourceFilePath]
,[DWIsCurrent] AS [SRC_DWIsCurrent]
,[DWValidFromDate] AS [SRC_DWValidFromDate]
,[DWValidToDate] AS [SRC_DWValidToDate]
,[DWCreatedDate] AS [SRC_DWCreatedDate]
,[DWModifiedDate] AS [SRC_DWModifiedDate]
,[DWIsDeletedInSource] AS [SRC_DWIsDeletedInSource]
,[DWDeletedInSourceDate] AS [SRC_DWDeletedInSourceDate]
 
FROM exportNuuDW.[ChipperTicketsComments]
 WHERE DWModifiedDate > convert(datetime, stuff(stuff(stuff('@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}', 9, 0, ' '), 12, 0, ':'), 15, 0, ':'))

,[customer.contact.channels.email.address] 
,[customer.contact.channels.email.preferred] 
,[customer.contact.channels.phone.number] 
,[customer.contact.channels.phone.preferred] 
,[customer.contact.name] 
,[customer.id] 
,[id] 
,[impact] 
,[issue.description] 
,[issue.start] 
,[issue.type] 
,[item.lid] 
,[reported] 
,[resolved] 
,[sla.id] 
,[status] 
,[subject] 
,[updated] 
,[sourceFilename] 
,[processedTimestamp] 
,[hour] 
,[quarterhour] 
,[DWSourceFilePath] AS [SRC_DWSourceFilePath]
,[DWIsCurrent] AS [SRC_DWIsCurrent]
,[DWValidFromDate] AS [SRC_DWValidFromDate]
,[DWValidToDate] AS [SRC_DWValidToDate]
,[DWCreatedDate] AS [SRC_DWCreatedDate]
,[DWModifiedDate] AS [SRC_DWModifiedDate]
,[DWIsDeletedInSource] AS [SRC_DWIsDeletedInSource]
,[DWDeletedInSourceDate] AS [SRC_DWDeletedInSourceDate]
,[product.id]

 WHERE DWModifiedDate > convert(datetime, stuff(stuff(stuff('@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}', 9, 0, ' '), 12, 0, ':'), 15, 0, ':'))

SELECT DISTINCT 
'AzureSqlDatabase' AS SourceSystemTypeName	
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_CATALOG] AS TableCatalogName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_SCHEMA] AS SchemaName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_NAME] AS TableName
,COLUMNS.[COLUMN_NAME] AS ColumnName
,COLUMNS.[ORDINAL_POSITION] AS OrdinalPositionNumber
,COLUMNS.[DATA_TYPE] AS DataTypeName
,COLUMNS.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS MaximumLenghtNumber 
,CAST(COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS INT) AS NumericPrecisionNumber 
,COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NumericScaleNumber 
,KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.ORDINAL_POSITION AS KeySequenceNumber 
,@{item().SourceObjectID} AS SourceObjectID
FROM 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
LEFT JOIN
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
		ON
			TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_CATALOG = COLUMNS.TABLE_CATALOG
		AND	TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_SCHEMA = COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_NAME = COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
LEFT JOIN 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
ON	
	KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_NAME
	AND KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.COLUMN_NAME = COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE 
	COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().SourceSchemaName}'
	AND COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = '@{item().SourceObjectName}'

SELECT DISTINCT 
'AzureSqlDatabase' AS SourceSystemTypeName	
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_CATALOG] AS TableCatalogName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_SCHEMA] AS SchemaName
,COLUMNS.[TABLE_NAME] AS TableName
,COLUMNS.[COLUMN_NAME] AS ColumnName
,COLUMNS.[ORDINAL_POSITION] AS OrdinalPositionNumber
,COLUMNS.[DATA_TYPE] AS DataTypeName
,COLUMNS.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] AS MaximumLenghtNumber 
,CAST(COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] AS INT) AS NumericPrecisionNumber 
,COLUMNS.[NUMERIC_SCALE] AS NumericScaleNumber 
,KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.ORDINAL_POSITION AS KeySequenceNumber 
,@{item().SourceObjectID} AS SourceObjectID
FROM 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
LEFT JOIN
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS
		ON
			TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_CATALOG = COLUMNS.TABLE_CATALOG
		AND	TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_SCHEMA = COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.TABLE_NAME = COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME
		AND TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
LEFT JOIN 
	INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
ON	
	KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TABLE_CONSTRAINTS.CONSTRAINT_NAME
	AND KEY_COLUMN_USAGE.COLUMN_NAME = COLUMNS.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE 
	COLUMNS.TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().SourceSchemaName}'
	AND COLUMNS.TABLE_NAME = '@{item().SourceObjectName}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	SourceObjectID
        ,ConnectionType
	,FileExtension
	,FileSystem AS FileSystemName
	,FileName
	,concat(FileName,'.',FileExtension) AS FullFileName
	,Folder
	,TargetDestinationFlag
	,FileSpecification
	,RowSeparator
	,ColumnDelimiter
	,TextQualifier
	,IsHeaderPresent
	,Encoding
	,LoopFile
  FROM [meta].[SourceObjectDefinitions]
  WHERE ConnectionName = 'datalake01ingestionNetcracker_interim'
